title: Luffy Lost? || One Piece Episode 560, 561 & 562 REACTION
author: RuffSenpai
description: A reaction video covering episodes 560-562 of One Piece, featuring the battles at Fish-Man Island including Luffy vs Hody and other Straw Hat matchups.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers through episode 562 of the Fish-Man Island arc

title: One Piece Episode 560 - Demons
author: King Of Lightning
description: King Of Lightning's reaction and review of episode 560. He described it as 'OK' with 'a lot of exciting parts' though noted 'the pacing was a little bit slow' and it was 'mainly a set up episode.'

title: One Piece Episode 560 UNCUT REACTION!

description: Uncut reaction to One Piece episode 560 available exclusively on Patreon.

description: Reaction to episodes 560-561 focusing on the Noah crisis and the battles at Fish-Man Island.

title: 558-560: The Noah Closing in! The Fish-Man Island Facing Destruction!, Hurry up, Luffy! Shirahoshi's Life in Jeopardy! and The Fierce Fight Begins! Luffy vs. Hordy!

title: One Piece – Fishman Island Arc (Episodes 554 – 574) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the latter portion of the Fish-Man Island arc, including episode 560, discussing the arc's themes of racism, the battles, and overall reception.
